title: Web-Based Educational Program for Hispanic Living Kidney Donation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of kidney diseases and transplantation procedures
context.additional_context: Bilingual web-based learning environment incorporating cultural contexts for Hispanic communities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the medical procedures and risk factors of living kidney donation with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify three or more social and emotional considerations of living kidney donation from a Hispanic cultural perspective.
Learners can realistically simulate the donor evaluation process in a real-world context through VR simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
